TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TableProvider extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides the base class for Dynamic Data table providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Table providers must extend this class. LINQ to SQL classes and the ADO.NET Entity data model are providers that extend this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.DataModelProvider model) cil managed

Docs.param: The model that the table belongs to.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for use by an inherited class instance. This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
Gets the attributes that are defined for the table that is represented by this provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanDelete(class System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal principal) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to delete items from the table.
Docs.returns: if the user is allowed to delete items from the table; otherwise, .
Docs.value: if the user is allowed to delete items from the table; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanInsert(class System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal principal) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to insert items into the table.
Docs.returns: if the user is allowed to insert items into the table; otherwise, .
Docs.value: if the user is allowed to insert items into the table; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanRead(class System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal principal) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to read items in the table.
Docs.returns: if the user is allowed to read items in the table; otherwise, .
Docs.value: if the user is allowed to read items in the table; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanUpdate(class System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal principal) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the user is allowed to update items in the table.
Docs.returns: if the user is allowed to update items in the table; otherwise, .
Docs.value: if the user is allowed to update items in the table; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of columns in this table.
Docs.value: The collection of columns in this table.
Docs.returns: The collection of columns in this table.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataContextPropertyName { get; protected set; }

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the table from the data context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](../Topic/ASP.NET%20Dynamic%20Data.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Type EntityType { get; protected set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the type that represents the table.
Docs.value: The type that represents the table.
Docs.returns: The type that represents the table.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual object EvaluateForeignKey (object row, string foreignKeyName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object EvaluateForeignKey(object row, string foreignKeyName) cil managed

Docs.param: The row to get the foreign-key value for.
The name of the foreign-key column.
Docs.summary: Returns the value of a foreign key for the specified row.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Linq.IQueryable GetQuery(object context) cil managed

Docs.param: The data context for the table.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, returns the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable?displayProperty=fullName> object that in turn returns the elements of the table.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable?displayProperty=fullName> object that returns the elements of the table.
Docs.value: An <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable?displayProperty=fullName> object that returns the elements of the table.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor GetTypeDescriptor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the type descriptor for the table.
Docs.returns: The type descriptor for the table.
Docs.value: The type descriptor for the table.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Name { get; protected set; }

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Typically, this is the name of the table property in the data-context class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Type ParentEntityType { get; protected set; }

Docs.value: The parent type if the entity has a parent; otherwise, an instance of the class.
Docs.returns: The parent type if the entity has a parent; otherwise, an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Type RootEntityType { get; protected set; }

Docs.summary: Gets the root type for this entity.
Docs.value: The root type for this entity if the entity has a parent; otherwise, an instance of the class.
Docs.returns: The root type for this entity if the entity has a parent; otherwise, an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider.Name%2A> property of the instance.
Docs.returns: The name of the instance. If the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider.Name%2A> property is , the base class property is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is intended for debugging purposes.

Docs.value: The name of the instance. If the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.TableProvider.Name%2A> property is , the base class property is returned.
